summary: Kamran is a 12 year old boy in the present day who discovers that his ancestor is the 11th Century Mathematician, Astronomer, Poet of Persia, Omar Khayyam. The story has been passed down in... See full summary »
cast: Adam Echahly|Bruno Lastra|Moritz Bleibtreu|Rade Serbedzija|Vanessa Redgrave|Christopher Simpson|Marie Espinosa|Diane Baker|C. Thomas Howell|Kevin Anding|Puya Behinaein|Daniel Black|Dariush Iran Nezhad|Richard Dillard|Furkat Fayziyev|Fukrat Fayziev|Raushan Gaiziev|Faruh Girezov|Margharita Guschina|Sarah Hadaway|Elsevar Iskhakova|Hanane Joumal|Rustam Kodirov|Eleonalatovara Kottlab|Andy Madadian|Layla Lauren Mashayekh|Yasmin Paige|Egamberdi Rakhimov|Sep Riahi|Shani Rigsbee|Miodrag Stevanovic|Peter Symonds|Nazim Tulyahodzhayev|Shahurad Vossughi|Apick Youssefian|Tabassum Rasulov|Karimov Salohon|Ochilbekov Tashpulat|Bakaev Ubaydullo|Bahrullo Rakhimov|Shamsiddin Yulliev|Asadov Ahmad|Amil Kurbanov|Toshpulat Ochiltoshev
title: The Keeper: The Legend of Omar Khayyam
